titles.title: Electing a Minority Member to a standing committee.
Electing a Minority Member to a standing committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The Chair announced that without objection, the operation of H.Res. 640 is stayed pending the House's acceptance of a resignation creating a vacancy on the committee concerned.

term.name: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects a named minority Member to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.
